Business Pricing Features

Share your unfiltered
thoughts. Get Paid

Spense is an open platform for individuals to share their unfiltered thoughts.
Discuss the topics you love, and get paid for doing just that.
  • Receive 99% off the earnings.
  • Get paid via Debit Card, ACH, or PayPal.
  • Withdraw your earnings anytime.

Secure your money
with Escrow

Spense uses Escrow to secure all payments. We believe
Escrow offers the highest level of security for your payments,
so you never need to worry about scams.

A text editor like no other.

Our text editor pulls you into focus mode with it's simplistic design and usability so you can put out your best writings.
